episode.summary: Live show broadcasted on AT-X. Anchors: Hikasa Youko and Asakura Azumi Guests: StylipS

episode.title: 元カノ, 倒します!
I Will Defeat My Ex-Girlfriend!
Motokano, Taoshimasu!
episode.summary: While Kiba and Koneko back him up, Issei rushes in to rescue a critically injured Asia. Leaving the others behind, Raynare and Issei become engaged in a duel to the death! Elsewhere, Rias and Akeno have their hands full with Raynare`s fallen angels. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アクマ, やってます!
I Work as a Devil!
Akuma, Yattemasu!
episode.summary: New living arrangements are made for Asia, who has been living in the club`s room. Meanwhile, Issei begins a new training regimen with Rias to improve his physical fitness. Asia begins attending school, where she is placed in Issei`s class. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 使い魔, ゲットします!
I Get a Familiar!
Tsukaima, Get Shimasu!
episode.summary: Rias decides that it is time for Issei and Asia to have servant familiars. The school`s student council visits the club room, and Issei learns that they are another faction of devils. The two groups compete to see who gets first pick of the new familiars. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 約束, 守りに来ました!
I`m Here to Keep My Promise!
Yakusoku, Morini Kimashita!
episode.summary: Issei wakes up to find that the battle is over, and he has lost. Rias and the others are at a party in honor of her engagement to Riser, but with some help from Grayfia and Asia, Issei decides to crash it, rescue Rias, and bring her home with him! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 絶賛, 決戦中です!
The Acclaimed Battle Continues!
Zessan, Kessen Chuu Desu!
episode.summary: Kiba becomes entrenched in battle against Karlamine, one of Riser`s knights, while Akeno fights Yubelluna, his queen. Meanwhile, Issei takes on Ravel and the other remaining pieces. Rias launches an all-or-nothing sneak attack against Riser. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦, 始まります!
The Showdown Begins
Kessen, Hajimarimasu!
episode.summary: The time for the start of the Rating Game arrives, and the contestants are transported to a battlefield in an alternate dimension. While Asia and Rias remain at their base, Issei and Koneko face the opposition, and Issei reveals his new signature move. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 修行, はじめました!
I`ve Begun My Training!
Shugyou, Hajimemashita!
episode.summary: Issei and Asia undergo a special training camp with the other household members to get ready for the upcoming Rating Game. Issei struggles to figure out what his own special characteristic is. Rias explains more about devils and the Gremory family. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 喧嘩, 売ります!
I Pick a Fight!
Kenka, Urimasu!
episode.summary: Issei dreams that he is marrying Rias, which leads him to get in touch with his inner dragon. Asia confesses a desire to have a deeper relationship with Issei. But it is Rias who appears in Issei`s bedroom that night looking to lose her virginity! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.1 ~海水浴,行きます~
Going Sunbathing
Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 1: Kaisuiyoku, Ikimasu
episode.summary: The Occult Research Club goes on a beach outing. Issei messes up applying sun lotion to Rias, and is punished by being beaten by Koneko with a baseball bat.

episode.title: 妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.2 ~朱乃先輩,個人修行ですわ~
Akeno`s Personal Training
Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 2: Akeno-senpai, Kojin Shugyou Desu wa
episode.summary: Issei is being given lessons in magic by Akeno. After getting the living hell beaten out of him, he spills a parfait on her. She requests him to lick it off her chest. At this point, Issei wakes up in Asia`s lap and gets shocked by Rassei.

episode.title: 妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.3 ~小猫,ちょっと大胆......にゃん~
Koneko Goes a Little Over the Top...Meow
Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 3: Koneko, Chotto Daitan... Nyan
episode.summary: Koneko accidentally has her personality reversed magically, making her incredibly sexually active and reversing her sexual preference. The episode closes when Issei arrives to the clubroom late to find Koneko has taken Rias & Asia into the shower without him.

episode.title: 妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.4 ~ドレスブレイク, 誕生秘話?~
Dress Break, Secret Story of Birth?
Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 4: Dress Break, Tanjou Hiwa?
妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.5 ~うどん, 作ります!~
We Are Making Udon!
Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 5: Udon, Tsukurimasu!
妄想爆揺解除オリジナルビデオVol.6 ~アーシア, 変身します!~
Asia Transforms!
Mousou Bakuyure Kaijo Original Video Vol. 6: Asia, Henshin Shimasu!
